QuestData.Title: Ring of Trials: Raketalon
QuestData.Description: You may have defeated Crushmaul, but the party's over now...you've got another fight!$b$bThe Highmaul take gladiatin' seriously; so when they built the Ring of Trials, they searched far and wide for the most brutal creatures they could find!$b$bYou're up against a dread raven the ogres are calling Raketalon! I'm telling you, $n, something about that bird just ain't right...I think it truly enjoys the act of killing!$b$bRaketalon toyed with the last gladiator for hours before eating him.$b$bTry not to die!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The key to not being eaten by Raketalon is to avoid the beak!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Raketalon in the Ring of Trials.
QuestData.RewardText: You did it, $n! Raketalon has actually been defeated!$b$bI'd never have believed it if I hadn't seen it with my very own two eyes. You've got a fire in your belly and dollar signs in your eyes, kid!$b$bHere's your cut of the profit, but don't stop now! You're on a roll!

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Guzrug to begin the fight
